title: KNX
info_project_upload_description: We extract details such as names, group addresses, devices, group objects, topology, and building structure from your project file. Home Assistant does not store the ETS project file itself nor its optional password for security reasons.
info_issue_tracker: Found an issue or feature request for
group_monitor_connected_waiting_telegram: Group monitor is connected and waiting for telegrams
project_explore_upload: To use the project explorer please upload a KNX project on Info tab first!
project_explore_version_l1: The XKNXProject version used during upload and parsing of the ETS project was:
project_explore_version_l3: Please delete and upload the ETS project on Info again to use the ETS Project tool!
